actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the preservation of Civil War battlefields for public purposes.
short_title: Civil War Battlefields Preservation Tax Incentives Act of 1994

summary.text: Civil War Battlefields Preservation Tax Incentives Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from the value of a gross estate of the transfer by an heir of a qualified conservation easement on land within a Civil War battlefield site. Provides that the dollar limitation on the valuation of farm and other real property does not apply to property within a Civil War battlefield site. Allows a tax credit of 50 percent of the amount of any qualified Civil War battlefield charitable contribution.

titles.title: Civil War Battlefields Preservation Tax Incentives Act of 1994
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the preservation of Civil War battlefields for public purposes.
